biotools.summary: Tool for assisted assembly using multiple references. It takes a short read assembly (a set of contigs), a set of related references and a corresponding phylogenetic tree and then assembles the contigs into scaffolds.

bioschemas.name: Ragout
bioschemas.summary: Tool for assisted assembly using multiple references. It takes a short read assembly (a set of contigs), a set of related references and a corresponding phylogenetic tree and then assembles the contigs into scaffolds.
